Posts.Content: Heidi_Ho-s_Little_Bro wrote: I'm here with Heidi at the hospital and she wanted me to ask the group some questions. 1) What  major side effects of whole brain radiation did some of you have? 2) How long was it before the side effects started? 3) How long did the side effects last after radiation was completed? 4) Did anyone have to use a walker during radiation? 5) Did anyone experience hallucinations? Thanks, Heidi and Bobby  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Whole Brain Radiation - Side effects Heidi_Ho-s_Little_Bro hezzy
